_comment: Comprehensive system design patterns for standard applications based on industry best practices
_sources: Standard tech stacks for major application types

twitter_clone.description: Twitter/X-like microblogging platform with timeline, follows, tweets, media
architecture_notes: Read-heavy workload: Heavy caching with Redis for timeline/user data
Timeline: Fanout-on-write for small follows, fanout-on-read for celebrities
Media: S3 for storage, CDN (CloudFront) for delivery
Database: Postgres for user/relationships, Cassandra for tweets/timeline
Real-time: WebSocket for notifications, message queue for async tasks
Search: Elasticsearch for full-text tweet search
Scale: Load balancers, horizontal scaling, sharding

instagram_clone.description: Instagram-like photo/video sharing platform with feed, stories, likes, comments
architecture_notes: Media-heavy: S3 for original images, CDN for delivery, image processing pipeline
Multiple resolutions: Generate thumbnails, optimized versions on upload
Feed: Similar to Twitter but more media-focused, Redis cache critical
Stories: TTL-based ephemeral content (24h), separate storage strategy
Real-time: WebSocket for likes/comments updates
Database: Postgres for users/relationships, Cassandra for feed/activity
Recommendation: ML service for explore feed, personalized content

youtube_clone.description: YouTube-like video streaming platform with upload, transcode, playback, recommendations
architecture_notes: Video pipeline: Upload -> S3 -> Transcoding queue -> Multiple resolutions -> CDN
Transcoding: FFmpeg in worker containers, multiple bitrates (360p-4K)
Streaming: HLS/DASH adaptive bitrate streaming via CDN
Storage: S3 for videos (massive scale), separate buckets for raw/processed
Database: Postgres for metadata, Redis for view counts/trending
Recommendation: ML-based recommendation engine, user history analysis
Search: Elasticsearch for video search with autocomplete
Scale: CDN critical for bandwidth, multi-region S3 replication

whatsapp_clone.description: WhatsApp-like messaging app with real-time chat, media sharing, E2E encryption
architecture_notes: Real-time: WebSocket connections for instant message delivery
E2E encryption: Signal protocol, keys stored on client only
Database: Cassandra for message history (write-heavy), Redis for online status
Media: S3 for images/videos/voice, E2E encrypted before upload
Presence: Redis-based tracking of online/last-seen status
Groups: Separate handling for broadcast vs group chats
Delivery: Message queue for offline message delivery
Scale: Minimal server processing, most logic on client

uber_clone.description: Uber-like ride-hailing platform with real-time tracking, matching, payments
architecture_notes: Geospatial: Redis GeoHash for nearby driver matching
Real-time: WebSocket for live location updates, ETA calculations
Matching algorithm: Optimize for distance, driver rating, ETA
Database: Postgres for trips/users, Cassandra for location history
Pricing: Dynamic surge pricing based on supply/demand
Payments: Stripe integration with retry/reconciliation logic
Maps: Google Maps/Mapbox for routing, ETAs, geocoding
Scale: Sharding by geographic region, separate deployments per city

netflix_clone.description: Netflix-like video streaming platform with subscriptions, recommendations, content delivery
architecture_notes: CDN-heavy: Global CDN for video delivery, edge caching
Recommendation: Sophisticated ML models for personalization
Adaptive streaming: Multiple bitrates based on network conditions
Subscription: Recurring billing, payment retry logic
Content: Multi-region replication for low latency
Database: Cassandra for viewing history, Redis for session data
Analytics: Track every user interaction for recommendations

airbnb_clone.description: Airbnb-like marketplace for property rentals with search, booking, payments
architecture_notes: Search: Elasticsearch with geospatial queries, filters (price, dates, amenities)
Calendar: Complex availability management, booking conflicts
Payments: Escrow system, host payout scheduling
Reviews: Two-way review system (host and guest)
Pricing: Dynamic pricing recommendations, seasonal adjustments
Images: S3 + CDN for property photos, image optimization
Booking: Transaction management, cancellation policies

shopify_ecommerce.description: E-commerce platform with product catalog, cart, checkout, inventory
architecture_notes: Catalog: Elasticsearch for product search, faceted filters
Cart: Redis for session-based cart, expiration handling
Inventory: Real-time stock management, reservation system
Checkout: Multi-step flow, address validation, tax calculation
Payments: Multiple gateway support, PCI compliance
Orders: State machine for order lifecycle, fulfillment tracking
CDN: Product images, static assets

slack_clone.description: Slack-like team collaboration platform with channels, DMs, file sharing
architecture_notes: Real-time: WebSocket for instant message delivery, typing indicators
Search: Elasticsearch for message/file search across workspace
Threading: Nested message structure, conversation context
Files: S3 storage, preview generation, virus scanning
Presence: Redis for online status, active channel tracking
Channels: Public/private, workspace-scoped permissions
Integrations: Webhook support, bot framework, OAuth apps

tiktok_clone.description: TikTok-like short-form video platform with feed, recommendations, social features
architecture_notes: Feed algorithm: ML-driven recommendation engine (For You Page)
Video: Short-form optimized, aggressive CDN caching
Transcoding: Fast processing, multiple resolutions
Real-time: WebSocket for live view/like counts
Social graph: Follow relationships, trending detection
Analytics: Track engagement metrics for algorithm training
CDN: Critical for video delivery, edge caching
